cleaning_robot.setting: Robot can only touch objects within the range of gripper contact. The robot has two grippers and thus the robot can hold two objects at most simultaneously.

empty_pool.setting: the pool is empty at the intial stage but it could be filled with water with opening the faucet of the pool.

state_description.type: the type of the robot or object, e.g., robot, cube, table, etc.
state_description.position: the 3d position of the robot or object, e.g., [4.0, 6.0, -2.0]
state_description.size: the size of the robot or object, e.g., size of an apple is 0.1
state_description.gripper_content: the content in the gripper of the robot. It is a nested list that represent the affliation relationship of objects. e.g., [], [['bowl']], [['fruit_tray',['apple']]]
state_description.setting: the role setting of the robot or object, e.g., 'Robot can only touch objects within the range of gripper contact.'
state_description.gripper_contact_range: the range of robot gripper contact, e.g., 0.5
state_description.detergent_applied_to_pool: whether the detergent has been applied to the pool, e.g., True or False
state_description.clean_status: the cleanliness status of the pool, e.g., 'clean' or 'stained'
state_description.water_state: the state of water in faucet or pool, e.g., 'on', 'off', 'no_water', 'filled'
state_description.pool_scrubbed: whether the pool has been scrubbed with the brush, e.g., True or False
state_description.pool_rinsed: whether the pool has been rinsed with water, e.g., True or False
state_description.pool_clean: whether the pool is clean, e.g., True or False
state_description.faucet_status: whether the faucet is turned on, e.g., on or off
